Posts.Content: Hi Shaz, I had a cough for a little while after my op too, but it went eventually, so don't worry - I think it has something to do with the pipes and things that they put down your throat whilst doing the op.  It is bound to irritate for a little while. Hope everything go's well for you xx
Posts.Title: coughing

Posts.Content: Thank you for all your suggestions, will give oncology a ring today and see if they can help.
Posts.Title: Heart Burn

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I hope everyone is feeling ok and side effects going well - love and healing goes out to all xxx I would just like to ask, I am on Fec at the moment, had my first session a week ago and have been plagued by persistent heartburn - does anyone else have this problem and if so any hints or tips?
Posts.Title: Heart Burn

Posts.Content: Thank you Jacqueline - I thought perhaps it was the food I was eating or maybe I was taking my meds wrong.  I will contact the oncologist, and see if she can help.  Once again, many thanks - Healing thoughts go out to you xxx ...
Posts.Title: Heart Burn
